author: robertkaucher
body:
This is an issue on Mac and Linux versions of PowerShell. We have validated that Windows executes as expected. Interestingly, we also tested this with Invoke-WebRequest and found that it did not have the same issue and executed as expected on all 3 platforms.

## Steps to reproduce
You must execute this in a script via the terminal. This will not occur when commands are executed individually in the terminal by typing them.

1. Create a script file with Invoke-Rest Method before Read-Host as in the example.
2. Execute the script in the terminal. 

```
   Invoke-RestMethod http://somerestapi.domain/api/derp/
   $test = Read-Host "Enter some text"
   Write-Host $test

```

## Expected behavior

Execution of Invoke-RestMethod should complete before Read-Host is invoked.

## Actual behavior

```
Enter some text: test
test
count next                                                   previous results
----- ----                                                   -------- -------
 1940 http://bestemmie.org/api/bestemmie/?limit=50&offset=50          {@{beste…
```
